sentence: A proposal by Cranswick to build one of Europe’s largest poultry and pig megafarms in Norfolk was unanimously rejected by local councillors due to environmental and climate concerns.

sentence: Planning officers found the application lacked sufficient environmental data and warned that approving it would be unlawful.

sentence: Despite this, the project faced strong opposition and was halted over its potential ecological and climate impact.
